message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am interested in purchasing the product, but I would like to propose a price of $900000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $850000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
